headline: Chubb Expects $1.5 Billion in LA Wildfire Losses as It Shrinks California Coverage
summary: By Katherine Hamilton Chubb said it will spend about $1.5 billion pretax on Los Angeles wildfire recovery and is reducing its coverage in California because pricing in the state isn't keeping up...
